translation: Proceed to the next mission?{#Name=" "}
source: Proceed to the next mission?{#Name=" "}

translation: みんなで一つの場所に集まるデモ{#Name=" "}
source: みんなで一つの場所に集まるデモ{#Name=" "}

translation: It appears Lady Two places enormous trust in her disciple.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: It appears Lady Two places enormous trust in her disciple.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Why ya sayin' that in front of Zero? Jealous?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Why ya sayin' that in front of Zero? Jealous?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: N-No! It was hardly my intention to imply that—{#Name="Decadus"}
source: N-No! It was hardly my intention to imply that—{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I really don't care.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I really don't care.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Oh. Very well then.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: ...Oh. Very well then.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Too bad, freak. No ball kicks for you today!{LF}Ha ha ha ha!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Too bad, freak. No ball kicks for you today!{LF}Ha ha ha ha!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Uuungh...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Uuungh...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: To her soldiers and to her disciple, an Intoner is a godlike presence.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: To her soldiers and to her disciple, an Intoner is a godlike presence.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: How odd that Mikhail is to be your downfall...{#Name="Octa"}
source: How odd that Mikhail is to be your downfall...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Never believe what your enemy tells you.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Never believe what your enemy tells you.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But we all saw what he did to Lady Three, a fellow Intoner.{#Name="Octa"}
source: But we all saw what he did to Lady Three, a fellow Intoner.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Go to sleep already, would you?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Go to sleep already, would you?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: 竜の行為は暴走ではないと？{#Name="オクタ"}
source: 竜の行為は暴走ではないと？{#Name="オクタ"}

translation: ……もう寝ろ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ……もう寝ろ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: You may dismiss it, but my concerns about Mikhail are genuine...{#Name="Octa"}
source: You may dismiss it, but my concerns about Mikhail are genuine...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Hey, so you're not worried at all?{LF}About Cent's warning, I mean?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hey, so you're not worried at all?{LF}About Cent's warning, I mean?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I don't even remember what he said.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I don't even remember what he said.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: He said that dumb dragon would be your downfall!{#Name="Dito"}
source: He said that dumb dragon would be your downfall!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: No, I'm not worried. ...Are you?{#Name="Zero"}
source: No, I'm not worried. ...Are you?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Me? Hell, no. My downfall started the day I met you!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Me? Hell, no. My downfall started the day I met you!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Cute.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Cute.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Not that anyone cares, but I need a bath something fierce...{#Name="Dito"}
source: Not that anyone cares, but I need a bath something fierce...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: So who knows where the Shrine of Sands is?{LF}...Anyone? ...Show of hands?{LF}...Thaaat's what I thought.{#Name="Dito"}
source: So who knows where the Shrine of Sands is?{LF}...Anyone? ...Show of hands?{LF}...Thaaat's what I thought.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Guess we'll just have to wander around like idiots{LF}until we stumble into it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Guess we'll just have to wander around like idiots{LF}until we stumble into it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I heard tell the nearby underground ruins are{LF}being used as barracks for the enemy troops.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I heard tell the nearby underground ruins are{LF}being used as barracks for the enemy troops.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Good enough. We'll start there.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Good enough. We'll start there.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So what should I do?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: So what should I do?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: You fly up and scout ahead, yeah?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You fly up and scout ahead, yeah?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You got it, Zero! You got it!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: You got it, Zero! You got it!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: じゃあ、まずはそこからかな{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: じゃあ、まずはそこからかな{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ボクはどうすればいいの？{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ボクはどうすればいいの？{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: キミは上空からの情報収集を頼む{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: キミは上空からの情報収集を頼む{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: 了解だよ！了解だよ！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: 了解だよ！了解だよ！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: 初回会話{#Name=" "}
source: 初回会話{#Name=" "}

translation: ループ会話{#Name=" "}
source: ループ会話{#Name=" "}

translation: I just remembered something. A golem told me{LF}that Two is in the Shrine of Sands!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I just remembered something. A golem told me{LF}that Two is in the Shrine of Sands!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: A golem "told" you? Golems can't talk, dummy.{LF}They're stone.{#Name="Zero"}
source: A golem "told" you? Golems can't talk, dummy.{LF}They're stone.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Well, he didn't talk or whatever.{LF}It was more like his soul spoke to me.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Well, he didn't talk or whatever.{LF}It was more like his soul spoke to me.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: There's no such thing as a soul.{#Name="Zero"}
source: There's no such thing as a soul.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I just remembered something. A golem told me{LF}that Two is in the Shrine of Sands!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I just remembered something. A golem told me{LF}that Two is in the Shrine of Sands!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Cent claimed Zero's dragon would be her downfall.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Cent claimed Zero's dragon would be her downfall.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: What was the meaning behind this ominous prophecy?{#Name="Accord"}
source: What was the meaning behind this ominous prophecy?{#Name="Accord"}

translation: In search of information, Zero traveled to{LF}the ruins beneath the Land of Sands...{#Name="Accord"}
source: In search of information, Zero traveled to{LF}the ruins beneath the Land of Sands...{#Name="Accord"}
